app.name: SilentSpeak
app.tagline: Safe, anonymous peer support with facilitator oversight

steps.title: Sign in to explore SilentSpeak
steps.description: Use any username and password to continue. Nothing is stored outside your browser in this demo.

steps.title: Community Guidelines
steps.description: A few commitments help everyone feel safe.
guidelines: Keep conversations respectful, supportive, and anonymous.
Flag posts that suggest immediate harm so facilitators can act quickly.
Understand facilitators may review posts to keep the space safe.
Use SilentSpeak for peer support, not urgent crisis intervention.
Acknowledge crisis protocols could notify emergency contacts if risk is detected.
steps.crisisNotice: SilentSpeak is not a replacement for emergency services. If you are in crisis, contact your local emergency number or dial 988 (US) immediately.

steps.title: Choose how you show up
steps.description: Facilitators often use the custom profile during live demos. Participants usually remain anonymous.

profiles.name: Guided Support Coach
profiles.description: Predefined facilitator voice for walkthroughs featuring grounded, empathetic responses.
profiles.bio: Here to model supportive responses for the group.

profiles.name: Anonymous Ally
profiles.description: SilentSpeak generates a fresh alias every session so you can share freely without revealing identity.

steps.title: Pick a session room
steps.description: Rooms are grouped by date so you can join the right conversation during the walkthrough.
